title: Colson Design
intro1: I built Colson Design to learn Vue JS and Vuetify. The site name was chosen because it was the only '.com' I could get with my surname in it for very little money.
intro2: This website was a useful project to pick up after I finished the Makers Bootcamp, keeping my coding skills sharp while I look for a job.
tech1: Colson Design is built using Vue.JS and was used primarily as a learning exercise.
tech2: The website also utilises the Vuetify framework, lending Google's Material Design color palette and design sensibilities to my personal page.
team1: This website holds records of my previous projects as well as my CV. It is designed to showcase my work, and give people a peek into how I have improved my skills as a developer over time.
